name: Lootex Holdings Inc.
description: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.
one_liner: Developer of a cross-chain trading platform intended to liberate game asset ownership and connect blockchain games to traditional players. The company specializes in providing a game-oriented NFT marketplace and fraud-free ecosystem, enabling users to trade and discover the assets in the metaverse and also make virtual assets real by helping digital creators to protect their works.
